short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copies the URL and title of the current page to the clipboard in a specified format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TitleLinkClip is an extension designed for efficient web page referencing. By utilizing a designated keyboard shortcut, users can copy the title and URL of the active webpage directly to their clipboard in markdown format.

Shortcut instructions:
- Mac: Cmd + Shift + Y
- Windows: Ctrl + Shift + Y

Output format: [Page Title](URL)

This extension is optimized for individuals requiring markdown-formatted web references for documentation and related tasks.
